typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SK_territoryid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_territoryid as string,
		territoryname as string,
		parentterritory as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> STG
source(output(
		SK_territoryid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_territoryid as string,
		territoryname as string,
		parentterritory as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> STG2
source(output(
		SK_territoryid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		territoryname as string,
		sk_parentterritory as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DWH
STGHASH, DWH lookup(STG@SK_territoryid == DWH@SK_territoryid,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(DWH@HASHKEY),
	STGHASH2!=DWH@HASHKEY,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Nuevos, Actualizaciones, Nada)
ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow2
STG derive(STGHASH2 = crc32(512,toString(territoryname),upper(toString(parentterritory)))) ~> STGHASH
AlterRow1, STG2 join(upper(ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@parentterritory) == STG2@BK_territoryid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 derive(STG2ParentTerritory = STG2@SK_territoryid) ~> DerivedColumn1
AlterRow2, STG2 join(upper(ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones@parentterritory) == STG2@BK_territoryid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 derive(STG2ParentTerritory = STG2@SK_territoryid) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SK_territoryid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		territoryname as string,
		SK_parentterritory as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		SK_territoryid = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@SK_territoryid,
		HASHKEY = STGHASH2,
		territoryname = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@territoryname,
		SK_parentterritory = STG2ParentTerritory
	)) ~> sink1
DerivedColumn2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SK_territoryid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		territoryname as string,
		SK_parentterritory as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['SK_territoryid'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		SK_territoryid = ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones@SK_territoryid,
		HASHKEY = STGHASH2,
		territoryname = ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones@territoryname,
		SK_parentterritory = STG2ParentTerritory
	)) ~> sink2
